## JsonCompatible.ArrayValidator type

A validator which validates arrays of [JsonCompatible](./ts-json-base.jsoncompatibletype.md) values in place.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ArrayValidator<T, TC = unknown> = Validation.Classes.ArrayValidator<JsonCompatibleType<T>, TC>;
```
